name: Keep track of every Toky call in Google Sheets
description: Every time a call is ended in Toky, Make will automatically log the call information in Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kNE-OZIJ4um6pEAOMSfc8GOE6Ge1BcWYk-GjKUMcuI4/edit?usp=sharing).
